alert.note: Alert for Burt; Butler; Cuming; Dodge; Douglas; Saunders; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:09AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Monona, Burt, southeastern Cuming, western Washington, Dodge, northwestern Douglas, eastern Butler and northern Saunders Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 408 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of Lyons to 3 miles southeast of Linwood. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lyons around 415 AM CDT. Oakland around 420 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cedar Bluffs, Colon, Fremont, Mead, Inglewood, Woodcliff, Blencoe and Leshara. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 101 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Burt; Butler; Cuming; Dodge; Douglas; Saunders; Washington
